definition: a large poisonous agaric with orange caps and narrow clustered stalks
details:
noun
- a large poisonous agaric with orange caps and narrow clustered stalks
= synonyms: jack-o-lantern fungus
- a lantern made from a hollowed pumpkin in which holes are carved, typically to resemble facial features, in which a candle or light is placed; primarily created around Halloween
= example: a lantern made from a hollowed pumpkin in which holes are carved, typically to resemble facial features, in which a candle or light is placed; primarily created around Halloween
